name: Select.Item
description: Displays a list of options for the user to pick from.
description_zh: Displays a list of options for the user to pick from.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

persistFocus.description: Whether hovering outside should clear the highlighted state
persistFocus.description_zh: 将鼠标悬停在外面是否应清除高亮显示的状态
